AIPyS.DataLoad module

class AIPyS.DataLoad.DataLoad(Image_name=None, outPath=None)[source]

Bases: object

Takes a list of image names and returns a single image or a list of images. Note: Images must be 16-bit grayscale TIFF images, expecting glob. :param Image_name: glob module function :type Image_name: str :param outpath: :type outpath: str
